254432.content:
4. zadatak 

Kako napravit view koji cemo prikazat u QGIS-u?

Ovo mi ne radi, tj. ne upisuje nista u view:

```
CREATE TABLE forests AS
SELECT
	hrv_adm1.gid AS id,
	SUM(st_area(st_intersection(landuse.geom,hrv_adm1.geom)))/st_area(hrv_adm1.geom) AS area
FROM landuse, hrv_adm1
WHERE st_intersects(hrv_adm1.geom, landuse.geom) = true AND
	landuse.fclass = 'forest'
GROUP BY id


CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW forests_view AS
SELECT id, area
FROM forests
```
